description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the religious or other belief system affiliation of a person. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'Religious Affiliation SnCT' subset with subset original id 10791000000130; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'Religious or other belief system affiliation simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000531000000100.
